content: **socks for baby and children knitted in drops fabel** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **size** 1/3 - 6/9 - 12/18 months 2 3/4 years shoe size 15/17-18/19-20/21 22/23-24/25 foot length 10-11-12 14-16 cm / 4 -4 3/8 -4¾ 5½ -6¼ **materials** drops fabel from garnstudio 50 g for all sizes in color of your choice drops double pointed needles size 2 5 mm / us 1 or 2 or size needed to get 26 sts x 34 row in stockinette st =10 x 10 cm / 4 x 4 **pattern links ** swedish version 1 french version 2 1 http //www garnstudio com/lang/se/visoppskrift php d_nr=b16&d_id=26&lang=se 2 http //www garnstudio com/lang/fr/visoppskrift php d_nr=b16&d_id=26
